VisionScript

  • GitHub

Similarity[]

Get the similarity between two or more images.

Syntax

Similarity[]
Similarity[3]

Arguments

  • n - The number of images to compare. Defaults to 2.

Examples

The following example loads two images, compares them, and displays a similarity score.

Load["./photo.jpg"]
Load["./photo1.jpg"]
Similarity[]
Say[]
